title: Value Added & Digital Services
content: Digital Services are entirely automated and controlled by the Customer of the Service, for example an app on a mobile phone or tablet PC.BroadCom is a key enabler of digital services and has strategic partners in the following areas:Sites access management and control SystemsDigital services platforms providersEnterprise mobility management.USSD based value added service.
